app.name: ChiPi Link
app.description: The Chinese community super app in Panama

hero.title: Welcome to ChiPi Link
hero.subtitle: Your Chinese community in Panama, connected

features.membershipDesc: Join the club and enjoy exclusive benefits

auth.name: Full Name

laopan.registerButton: Don't have an account? Register on LaoPan

auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your account

exclusive.title: Exclusive Purchase
exclusive.subtitle: Your students' textbooks

admin.welcome: Welcome to ChiPi Link administration panel

common.name: Name

superpin.title: Super Pin

players.title: Players
players.noPlayers: No players in the ranking yet
players.noPlayersDesc: Players will appear when they play their first match
players.selectUsersDesc: Select registered users to convert them to players:
players.addedSuccess: {{name}} has been registered as a player
players.noMondayPlayers: No players in Monday.com or not configured

checkin.title: Player Check-in
checkin.scanQrInstructions: Generate a QR code for the player to scan
checkin.geoInstructions: Your location will be verified to confirm you're at the club
checkin.geoNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported in this browser
checkin.geoOutOfRange: You're outside the allowed club range

comparison.title: Compare Players
comparison.subtitle: Select players to compare their statistics
comparison.selectToCompare: Add players to see the comparison table

predictor.title: Match Predictor
predictor.subtitle: Prediction based on ELO, history and streak

rapidpin.selectOpponentDesc: Choose who you want to challenge
rapidpin.confirmNote: The player will receive a notification and must accept the challenge.
rapidpin.loginRequired: You must log in to challenge
rapidpin.subtitle: Quick matches with flexible validation

info.scoringDesc: Winner: 3 pts, Loser: 1 pt, Referee: 2 pts

seasons.title: Seasons
seasons.noSeasonsDesc: Create your first season to start tracking matches
seasons.name: Season Name

matches.title: Matches
matches.winnerMustBePlayer: Winner must be one of the players

closeSeason.title: Close Season
closeSeason.confirmDesc: Are you sure you want to close this season?

analytics.title: Reports & Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Community statistics and trends
analytics.titleDesc: Comprehensive business intelligence for purchase decisions
analytics.purchaseRecommendationsDesc: Books that need restocking based on sales velocity

social.moderationWarning: Your comments will be moderated due to previous warnings

seasons.title: Ranking Seasons
seasons.subtitle: Compete monthly for exclusive prizes
seasons.qualificationDesc: To qualify for rewards, you must complete at least {{minChallenges}} challenges and have minimum {{minPoints}} points in the season.
seasons.participateToEarn: Participate in seasons to earn rewards

conexiones.title: My Connections
conexiones.subtitle: Manage your relationships with other users

transferencias.title: Transfer
transferencias.subtitle: Send money to your connections
transferencias.noPermission: You don't have permission to transfer to this user

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to ChiPi Link administration panel

wallet.title: ChipiWallet
wallet.subtitle: Your digital wallet
wallet.searchUsers: Search users by name or email...
wallet.searchTxns: Search by user, email, or description...
wallet.manageWallets: Manage user wallets, transactions, and bank info

membershipCard.title: My Membership
membershipCard.subtitle: Manage your passes and visits
membershipCard.cashOrCardAtClub: Cash or card at the club

capabilities.noActiveCapabilities: You don't have active capabilities yet
capabilities.allCapabilitiesOwned: You already have all available capabilities
capabilities.requestDialogDesc: Your request will be reviewed by an administrator
capabilities.requestReason: Why do you want this capability?
capabilities.requestPlaceholder: Briefly describe why you need this capability...

dependents.createAccountDesc: Create an account for your dependent (child, family member in charge, etc.)
dependents.emailHelper: Will be used when the dependent activates their account

transfers.selectValidRecipient: Select a recipient and valid amount
transfers.noTransferPermission: You don't have connections with transfer permission
transfers.userAlreadyRegistered: This user is already registered. Add them to your connections first.
transfers.invitationSent: Invitation sent. When they register, you can transfer funds to them.

qrCode.title: My QR Code
qrCode.subtitle: Use this code for quick check-in and payments
qrCode.receivePaymentsDesc: Show this QR to receive transfers
qrCode.makePaymentsDesc: Scan a QR to transfer funds
qrCode.scanInfo: Club staff can scan this code to:
qrCode.securityNote: Don't share this code. If you lose it, regenerate a new one.

account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your profile, wallet, connections and more
account.loginRequired: You must log in to access this section

qrScanner.title: QR Scanner
qrScanner.subtitle: Scan customer QR codes for check-in and payments

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Manage your notification preferences
notifications.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
notifications.preferencesSubtitle: Configure how and when to receive notifications
notifications.quietHoursDesc: Do not receive notifications during these hours
notifications.categoriesDesc: Choose which types of notifications you want to receive

pinpanclub.title: PinPan Club
pinpanclub.subtitle: Table tennis community and rankings
pinpanclub.settingsDesc: Configure which sections are visible to different users

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect with external services
integrations.configureSync: Configure connection and sync with Monday.com for different modules
integrations.noUsersLinked: No users linked yet. Register a user or click "Sync All Users".
integrations.realTimeSync: Real-time sync status between the app and Monday.com

siteConfig.title: General Information
siteConfig.titleDesc: Configure your site's name and description

roles.title: Roles & Permissions
roles.titleDesc: Manage system roles and assign permissions to users
roles.selectRoleDetails: Select a role to view its details
roles.superAdminWarning: Super Admin role grants full system access
roles.deleteRole: Delete this role? Users with this role will be changed to User.
roles.onlySystemPermsEditable: You can only modify permissions of system roles
roles.configurePerms: Configure the name, level and permissions of the role
roles.changeHistoryDesc: Log of all actions performed on roles and permissions

authConfig.title: Authentication Methods
authConfig.titleDesc: Configure available login and registration methods
authConfig.loginMethodsDesc: Enable or disable authentication methods available to users
authConfig.googleDisabledNote: Google Auth disabled - not visible to users
authConfig.emailMethodNote: Email & Password method cannot be disabled as it is the primary method.
authConfig.registrationFieldsDesc: Configure which fields appear in the registration form
authConfig.locationCaptureDesc: Capture user's location automatically on registration (using IP)
authConfig.locationCaptureNote: When enabled, the user's approximate location based on their IP address will be saved.
authConfig.locationHistoryNote: This information is stored as history and is not shown to the user.

formConfig.title: Form Configuration
formConfig.formUrlDesc: Share this URL or embed it in your website

demoData.title: Demo Data
demoData.titleDesc: Generate fictional data to test and demo the application
demoData.confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete all demo data? This will remove demo players, fake matches and test users.
demoData.includes12Players: 12 players with creative nicknames (El Rayo, La Tigresa, Dragon...)
demoData.includes3Users: 3 demo users with wallets and transactions

storeManager.productCategoriesDesc: Manage categories available in your store
storeManager.emojiHint: You can copy emojis from emojipedia.org
storeManager.orderDesc: Defines the display order (lower number = appears first)
storeManager.subject: Subject
storeManager.requiresPrepDesc: Enable if this product needs preparation time (e.g. hotdog, cappuccino)
storeManager.addValidProduct: Add at least one valid product

inventoryMgmt.importDesc: Download the template, fill in the information and upload the file to add products to inventory.
inventoryMgmt.templateColumns: The template includes columns: code, name, grade, quantity, price, subject, publisher, isbn, description
inventoryMgmt.duplicateHandling: What to do with existing codes?
inventoryMgmt.addQuantityDesc: Adds CSV quantity to existing. Ex: 10 existing + 5 from CSV = 15
inventoryMgmt.replaceQuantityDesc: Overwrites existing quantity with CSV. Ex: 10 existing -> 5 from CSV = 5
inventoryMgmt.skipExistingDesc: Only imports new products, ignores existing ones

orderFormConfig.title: Order Form Configuration
orderFormConfig.titleDesc: Manage fields that appear in the textbook order form

monday.title: Monday.com Integration
monday.configuredWorkspacesDesc: Each workspace uses its own API Key. You can configure multiple Monday.com accounts.
monday.apiKeyInstructions: Get your API Key from: Monday.com -> Your profile -> Admin -> API -> Personal API tokens
monday.howToGetKey: How to get your API Key?
monday.step2: Click your profile picture (top right corner)
monday.step4: In the My access tokens section, click Show
monday.step5: Copy your personal token and paste it here
monday.deleteWorkspaceConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace?
monday.availableBoardsDesc: Select a board as general destination for integrations
monday.manualConfigDesc: Enter the Board ID manually if it doesn't appear in the list

widgetManager.title: Widget Manager
widgetManager.titleDesc: Configure the embeddable widget for laopan.online
widgetManager.widgetEnabledDesc: Turn the widget on or off globally
widgetManager.widgetFeaturesDesc: Toggle which features are available in the widget
widgetManager.displayOptionsDesc: Control what the widget shows and hides when embedded
widgetManager.maintenanceModeDesc: Pause the widget - users see a maintenance message instead of the app
widgetManager.hideUrlBarDesc: Remove any visible URL or site information from the widget
widgetManager.hideNavbarFooterDesc: Remove the top navigation bar and bottom footer from the widget view
widgetManager.streamlinedFlowDesc: Only show: LaoPan Login -> Link Student -> Textbook Orders (if approved) -> Wallet. Hides all other elements.
widgetManager.widgetPlacementDesc: Configure the floating button position, icon, and style on laopan.online
widgetManager.securityDesc: Manage allowed origins that can embed the widget
widgetManager.allowedOriginsDesc: These domains are allowed to embed the widget iframe. Leave empty to allow all origins.
widgetManager.embedDesc: Copy this code and paste it into your laopan.online site (Invision Pages block or custom HTML)
widgetManager.siteUrlDesc: Your production domain. All embed codes will use this URL.
widgetManager.floatingButtonDesc: Adds a floating button to the page that opens the widget as a slide-out panel.
widgetManager.fullPageEmbedDesc: Embed the widget directly in an Invision Pages block or custom page as a full component.
widgetManager.sidebarEmbedDesc: Add to a sidebar or narrow container on laopan.online.

linking.title: PCA Textbooks
linking.titleDesc: Link students to access exclusive school textbooks
linking.clickToAdd: Click "Link Student" to add a student
linking.linkDialogDesc: Enter the student's information to request textbook access
linking.loginRequired: Please log in to access this feature
